column1: Figure 1: Median weekly pay for full-time employees was £640 in April 2022
Gross median weekly earnings by employment type, UK, April 2012 to April 2022

column2:
1. Estimates for 2022 data are provisional. 
2. Employees are on adult rates, and pay is unaffected by absence unless furloughed. 
3. Full-time is defined as employees working more than 30 paid hours per week (or 25 or more for the teaching professions). 
4. The plotline represents a discontinuity in 2021 because of a change in occupational coding.
